This wc_lang copy is from
commit 7f299c07d040cccda17417a59bffc72028e7612a
Author: Jonathan Karr <jonrkarr@gmail.com>
Date:   Thu Jan 17 00:24:37 2019 -0500

Code that's incompatible with using wc_lang/core.py as a schema moved into a string or commented out, and marked INCOMPATIBLE CODE.

This wc_lang directory provides two test wc_lang schemas, which are in core.py and core_modified.py.
